title: Pop-Up Ad Man 'Fesses To An Internet 'Sin' — But Hopes To Fix It
teaser: Ethan Zuckerman recently confessed to "the Internet's original sin," saying he helped create pop-up ads in the medium's early days. The director of MIT's Center for Civic Media tells Robert Siegel that it's not to late to repent, and to build a better Web — without ads.
